Note: g/word/p - global search for word and print
g/re/p - global search regular expression print

search and exec options

pound # show line number
y ank
d delete matching lines

:g/params[:foo]/# - show lines and line numbers where params[:foo] occurs

:g/^$/d - delete blank lines

:g/patter/+ y yank one line after the ones that match
<C-n> while typing looks for autocomplete matches

yanking into register:

specify register to use before yanking:

"a - uses register a
"ap - pastes from register a
"A - appends new text to context
"" - unnamed register
:registers - shows all the registers contents
"+ - shows system clipboard

macros @6:54

qa - start a recording named a
dW - delete a word
W - go foward one word
P - paste contents
j - move down a line
q - quit recording

type @a to start the playback of the recording named a
